website_summaries.verdict: For simple snapshots of stationary subjects, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 should do the trick. At least, as long as you have plenty of light.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 is an attractive, easy-to-use ultracompact camera with a few nice extras for its sub-$140 price tag
cons: Photos taken above ISO 200 are noticeably soft, and the camera's shooting performance is too slow for moving or impatient subjects

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera At An Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: Camera is compact and light weight. It has all the basic features you would need for great pictures and it is fairly easy to use. I was able to play with it for less than 5 minutes and have all the controls figured out without looking at a manual. The battery life seems great as I just got back from a week long vacation and after snapping over 150 photos I still have almost a full battery. I am also very impressed with how great my pictures turned out, vivid colors and great contrast.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Last of an obsolete line.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a replacement camera. I loved the last one I had, Thousands of phtos of good quality. Sadly they didn;t have a working one to replace it with!!! Unfortunately, it was the last one and it did not work. No problems with the return though.
customer_reviews.author: The OLD Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good for amateur photographers and travelers.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything for an amateur photographer, even in automatic mode, if you prefer it that way. Or you can turn off the automatic functions and manage those functions by your self. It has Carl Zeiss lens and that makes a difference. I have a friend with almost the same camera but with Sony lens and I can notice how colors and details are shaper in this camera. Also, because of its reduce size and weight, it's perfect for travelers (even if you have to be careful not to let it fall). However, I've had that accident a couple of times, and the camera is strong enough to survive just with some scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Albam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was everything the seller promised and more. He wrote a very helpful letter with the camera. If I would ever need anything like this again, I would check with this seller first. I recommend him highly.
customer_reviews.author: rl

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera pricelss!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Zeiss lenz is the best. So many ways to get best results. If you like to ajust, you'll like this camera. I take photos of my art work (pictures), large and small. Lighting is never a problem. Oh, I almost forgot to say going from one thing to another isn't quick like a bunny so some people reviewed it who were impatient. Read the reivews and you'll see what I mean. I took pictures all the way through the Vatican Museum in Rome and they were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...
customer_reviews.text: Impresionante rendimiento, realmente ha sido una herramienta super útil desde que la adquirí para ciertas cosas del trabajo, la calidad de fotografías en el área de macro me ha dejado más que satisfecho. Las opciones de configuraciones faciles de manipular. Realmente una excelente compra. Impressive performance, has really been a super useful tool since I bought some things to work, the quality of photographs in the macro area has left me more than satisfied. Configurations options easily manipulated. Really an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryck Antillon Zuñiga

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes pretty good pics, not the best though, for some reason the auto focus isn't great especially when trying to capture something that is moving. The picture usually comes out blurry and I've had cameras where the pictures comes out clear even when subject is moving. Overall I'm satisfied because it was inexpensive and pictures do come out clear and focused when everything is still.
customer_reviews.author: Tamarah Borges

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSCW650
customer_reviews.text: I love Sony Cyber-shot Cameras. I previously owned the W55 in pink and bought this one in silver. I made a fantastic upgrade. Now you can access the entire manuel within the camera, plus the panoramic view is included. I've had no problems with this camera. I also like that when I zoom-in to take a photo it doesn't come out blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Naiomie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high quality camera for the average joe.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a christmas gift for my mom. I gotta say, the picture quality is awesome. Indoor lighting in a normal room has some kind of tint to it that makes the photos look really professional. Also really cool how the battery itself gets charged, rather than having to plug in the camera so you don't have to deal with wires and it charges really quick! if you're just looking for a simple camera that takes good pictures, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera!!! Easy to use, and takes amazing pictures!!!!😊 Love the soft skin feature!! Makes your skin so flawless!!! Takes away the wrinkles too!!! Way to go Sony!!!!😊 Thanks for a great product!!! Would recommend this camera highly!!! Lori M.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good Memory Making Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quite some time ago and just realized I never reviewed it! I really like this camera but I am a little slower at learning new electronics. It has a lot of options so it takes a while to get used to unless you have a knack for technology. All in all it's neat; portable and takes nice pictures for someone who is tired of disposable cameras and has a horrible camera phone. It's nice to have on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: hey its Sony
customer_reviews.text: what else can i say other than its a Sony. i bought this camera as a gift and the person decided not to take it so i kept it. this is a great camera! it takes great pictuers. it focuses quickly and elimenates red eye. its sleek and will fit in your pocket and will not leave a bulge. it has a pretty good size screen
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great. It takes awesome pictures and video. I previously have a Sony Cyber-shot and it worked great as well but was just looking for something a bit better and looked around a bit and found this camera on sony.com but then found it cheaper on amazon. I think its great for the price only thing is I wish they would have had this model in pink. :)
customer_reviews.author: wispofisis

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear of this model ... and question similar Sony products.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera sitting around for years now...stopped using it. I wish I had never bought it. Battery door latch broke with normal attentive use. The infinity focus on the lens is bad....I prefer to use an earlier model Sony that I have which has a better lens imo than to touch this (I was so satisfied with my previous model which was the reason was why I trusted to buy this) - never again - wasted my cash.... will be very wary of Sony camera products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN C McMENEMY

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous cybershot that had a cracked screen, so I went with this newer model. Takes great pictures, but it is slow between shots, or displaying photos. Also, this camera (and none in the price range) have view finders anymore -- just the screen. I prefer view finders especially in bright sunlight. The camera is very thin and light and has a large lcd panel.
customer_reviews.author: GaryF

customer_reviews.title: look for another product
customer_reviews.text: I am quite disappointed with the pucture quality of this camera. I have owned othe point and shoot cameras and they have taken pictures that were far better.
customer_reviews.author: jsav

customer_reviews.title: A Really Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value in this bundle for the camera, case and SD card altogether in one package for the price paid. This was a gift for our son and he has had only positive things to say about the Sony camera and believes receiving the additional case and SD card at the same time was definitely a benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad battery door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and it works fine but the battery/memory card door latch broke off. I have to secure it closed with a small rubber band now. I had this problem with my last Sony camera too and next time I think I will look for another brand. The camera was over 6 months bought so I could not return it. beware.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Lipchik

customer_reviews.title: Dropped once from a counter and it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it once and it broke. Just from the counter to the floor... It worked great until then and very easy to use. I would have given it 5 starts but they should not be this fragile in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Big Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great travel and all-around camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an extended vacation to Hawaii. I was impressed with the abilities of this camera in a small package. The Ziess lens was a plus. More features than I needed, but glad it has them for all-around use at home. It will go with us again and again. Have a Sony Cybershot 5.0 MP camera, but this one is remarkably better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice handy cam for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the SONY Cyber-shot after my CanonPowershot was water damaged and is no longer functional. While I am still partial to the picture quality of my Canon, I have begun to appreciate the PowerShot after playing around with it's various settings (eg Toy - to get a vintagy look, Pop - to pop colors etc). I think price-wise, it is a good camera and a handy one to have for trips and various occasions when you don't want to lug around a huge DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: An ordinary voice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know because I bought it for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Pics are good, I wanted to return it but couldn't
customer_reviews.text: Pics are good, I wanted to return it but couldn't. It keeps shutting off and not take pics some times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my wife. The camera is light, it takes nice pictures. During the night it seems to have a little bit of trouble when there is not enough light, I mean the light from the living room, because the pictures look a little bit yellowish. Other than that I think it is a good camera. The price was Ok I think
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Present for my father
customer_reviews.text: My dad is older and needed a camera that was simple to use and that could fit nicely in his pocket. He loved it, and it was easy to show him how to work it. Its a great product and I would recommend this for anyone that wants the ease of just pointing and clicking without a lot of hassle. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: crafty lady

customer_reviews.title: Listed as reconditioned by Sony
customer_reviews.text: Camera did not work, I did charge it fully before using. Nothing on screen after first few seconds it just went black, lens did not deploy, no "review" function, when the information screen came up it would not accept any input onto date setting function or change screen to anything else. It has been returned to you, accepted and I have notice of my refund. I am disappointed as it was to replace my previous one that I loved, quit working. I am very happy with Amazon's service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my wife's birthday - perfect little camera that she can take anywhere and fits into a small bag. Having the 16.1 captures and prints pictures nicely and we like the other point and shoot features. Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for Christmas, my mother loved it! She would not stop talking about all the features like the Panoramic View and Soft Face. It takes excellent pictures and 720 Video. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants a good compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It just wasn't as great as I expected. My old Sony camera with 1/2 the pixels seems to take pics just as well. I do like the larger screen, the black and white and a few other things, but I could of just stuck with my old camera and been just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melody O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: As always Sony is one of the best cameras. I bought this for my son in COsta Rica and he loves it. Says the colors are so vivid and he enjoys it. I always can on Sony. You do not have to guess. Other cameras we have had have not met the qualities of the this SOny.Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: carole miller

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Takes nice pictures and easy to it fit in pocket. The macro does not work well and the battery door won't stay closed. I have to keep a piece of tape on it.
customer_reviews.author: DIYers

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new Sony Camera, took it on vacation recently and it is easy to use, and easy to learn how to use, important for me as I dont like reading directions. It took great photos, served the purpose, but I have owned a Sony in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bundle. Everything works fine. Camera is small enough to fit in pocket when hubby is not using the case. Picture quality is exactly as expected for an affordable small camera.
customer_reviews.author: CityMominWoods

customer_reviews.title: Blanco's camera
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unpon recommendation of another physician in the clinic for use with tracking treatments progression. Has been giving us very clear and easy pictures. A little differenct application from family photos but very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for mom!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this camera. Granted she doesn't use her camera or laptop all that often, but whenever she pulls this out she smiles. On the camera itself, the picture quality is amazing, it's easy to use, and that cherry red color on it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Verma

customer_reviews.title: I like it except flash is too bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace an existing Sony Cybershot. This new model is very nice except the flash is too bright. When you take a picture of a person, their face is sort of washed out. The old model didn't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Global Investor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera. I love Sony
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight, durable, and takes very good pictures thanks to Carl-Zeiss lens. There users will easily adapt to having some delay when taking photographs. the flash is very good. and videos are tastefully designed and with excellent sound
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: it's cool and handy. adjusts easily and long battery life. portable and light with a very sharp image adjusts easily to light and to top it up it detects smile n captures though a bit slow but it cool.detects love it
customer_reviews.author: divinely

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Bought it while it was cheaper during black Friday. My sister's been using it ever since. Takes good pictures, has easy options, nice videos. Love it. I've always bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Nunufar

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and works great. I love the different colors to choose from. As long as you read the directions the camera works great.
customer_reviews.author: 79Rose79

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model because my Kodak camera broke and they do not make that model anymore. I was disappointed that this camera did not do date stamp, which I need for my job pictures. This is a very good camera for everyday pictures. I also purchased one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Wylie

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This is not for taking rapid photos but works great for everyday use. They should have an automatic shut off for the camera after downloading pictures otherwise it stays on and runs the battery down if you do not shut it off manually .
customer_reviews.author: islandrd

customer_reviews.title: Love the Cyber-shot past & present
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous year's model & loved it. Took good photos, was easy to use, small enough to fit in purse or pocket. I left the old one out in the rain & ruined it. So, I didn't think twice about ordering the newer model of the same camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight camera. Takes neat panoramic pictures. Video quality and picture quality is great. Love that it has a food picture setting since I blog about recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom. It's really a beautiful camera and it work perfectly. Everything was brand new and the quality was awesome! Really recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sachiko Nakata

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. tough, durable and economical to use that I give. 100 percent recommended for the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am simply amazed by this little camera. It take clean, professional grade pics. I recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recently as a gift for a family member from Amazon. The is great point and shoot camera. It also came with a 8GB card & the camera case. It is a very good deal. The shipping as fast.
customer_reviews.author: PAC_SG

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I have a Canon Rebel which is a great camera but this one takes outstanding pictures without changing lenses. I especially love the panoramic and movie features.
customer_reviews.author: jdwaldron

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this camera for a Thanksgiving trip to Disney. It worked great as just a tourist camera (taking pics of the family in front of rides, etc) but also got some great shots of the castles, fireworks, and light parades. Also, the 16 megapixels makes beautiful pictures when printed. For the cost this is an absolutely great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dubberly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it, but it is far more capable than we are
customer_reviews.author: Robert Broene

customer_reviews.title: i love it sony is the best
customer_reviews.text: sony is the best camera but you must take care it must carel ziuse and it has super ccd sensor very good in the dark envernoment excellent hd picture in door and out door but may be you must need buy another battery if you diceded stay out the door long time becouse battery lost spicial in the dark with work flash any way this camera is the best picture and video in door and out door
customer_reviews.author: wesam mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Cámara fotografica Fabulosa/ Fabulous Foto Camera
customer_reviews.text: Maravillosa cámara fotográfica marca sony, colmo mis expectativas, recomiendo comprar el producto, y la garantía es fantástica / Wonderful brand sony camera, my expectations high, recommend buying the product, and the warranty is great
customer_reviews.author: Elazam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was great. Sony always delivers amazing quality. The camera has some great features and is state of the art. The bundle is a nice deal price-wise; The memory card has more than enough capacity and the case is OK (It's not as nice as others, but it's good for keeping the camera safe). I recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this camera. The pictures are so sharp and clear, no matter what the lighting conditions. And as someone who has very shaky hands, this camera is perfect. I haven't had a single picture ruined by shaking!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I have an earlier version of this camera that I adore. This one was a birthday present for my Mom who envied my camera. She loves and it is a dream. Now I envy hers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W650
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really nice and a good deal. Sony pictures are sharp and products are always well made. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Wallstreet12

customer_reviews.title: It made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I like it because you don't have to know alot about photography to take a good picture, but it is a little difficult to make changes if you want to tweak somthing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Glover

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: nice article related to the low price... now i have great pictures and good videos from a well known brand and for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Sthormes

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact camera! I am really impressed with the picture quality for an entry level camera. Sony does a great job with the Cyber-shot line! I would highly recommend this camera for an on-the-go camera that fits easily in your purse/pocket. The camera also feels sturdy and well-made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony in this series. Both have taken 1000s of photos. The first one I dropped (my fault) and broke the viewing screen. I like d the Sony so I got a newer updated version with equally great results. The only little thing is the on/off switch should have a little more of a bump on it so you can feel it and not have to hunt for it the press it. I give it a 99.99999999% rating. Buy one !
customer_reviews.author: lovemystuff69

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this camera and it is a jewel. Had to have my own after using hers.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A. Stith

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent!!! Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom the best pocket camera.. love the price and the foto cuality...
customer_reviews.author: HValeria

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The battery lost it's charged after about 6 hours and we were unable to take additional pictures that we wanted. The battery was fully charged so there is no reason it was dead after about 6 hours. A lot of the pictures were very blurry and dark even thought we had it set on the automatic feature which is supposed to set the camera automatically for all the shots you take. Would not recommend and will probably have to get another camera to use.
customer_reviews.author: Darlean Spangenberger

customer_reviews.title: Cool but looks very cheaply built.
customer_reviews.text: It snaps great photos but sadly the video performances is okay as the lens make hell a lot of noises when zooming during video hence making the sounds recorded very bad. Besides, it's very obvious that it's cheaply built as the quality of the camera exterior really looks very unstable and doesnt feel "solid".
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband to take on his hunting trips. He really likes it. Says it is very easy to use and takes great photos!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Cybershot camera. I only upgrade to increase the megapixal count. They are inexpensive, reliable, and take great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: lovepups

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Asia trip, I came back with lot of memory and great WOWs from friends and relatives. The camera is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J.L

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend always complained about his old camera so I got him this one for Christmas, so far he seems to be having the time of his life with it. He likes to make youtube videos with his friends so he uses his camera often
customer_reviews.author: Heide W

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny powerfull camera. It takes beatiful pictures!. The panorama mode is amaizing!. For the price I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: dpres

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN EXCELLENT PRODUCT VERY GREATEST AND BEAUTIFUL. IT HAVE ESPECTACULAR COLOR AND VERY GOOD. VERY VERY VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased. i find myself wanting to tell everyone about my grreat camera. the pictures are beautifully clear.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: wonderful pictures
customer_reviews.text: didnt like at first am getting used to it still needs something extra but will do for know until can afford a new and better one
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for my mom for Christmas Day! She used it & loved it. It takes very clear pics & the Chrome touches on the black camera were nice! I would recommend this camera to anyone at any level or use this as a first digital camera!
customer_reviews.author: Bassman 8990

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use and carry
customer_reviews.text: This camera was for my wife. It is small and easy enough for my wife use without any problems. She has taken 58 pictures so far and the quality is very good. If it came with carry case I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jay jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: best for the value
customer_reviews.text: cool camera great for vaction or out with friends the sd card and the usb cable make it easy to share
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Small buttons Bad menu .... ..... .... .... ... ... ... ..not much else to say.... .... .... ... .
customer_reviews.author: CasSandra

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: Exellent product and very good for my son and this chritsmas this year. Just what i want for he now
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Camera very nice in red
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the red carrying case for 78 year old mother in law. She was so thrilled. Works great for point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jokinen

customer_reviews.title: Class Reunion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sony Sure Shot from Amazon to take to my 60th High School Class Reunion. It was easy to use and light to carry and travel with. Pictures came out great. I would recommend it to anyone looking to buy a new camera
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my purple 14MP camera I lost and it was worth it! Amazing images and video is great for cinematic wannabes.
customer_reviews.author: alexdude

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shots especially in low lit environments. I don't have any problems. Easy to use, very light in weight. Not bulky to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Richardson

customer_reviews.title: UNA MUY BUENA TIENDA Y UNA EXCELENTE CAMARA TAMBIEN...
customer_reviews.text: UN MUY BUEN PRODUCTO, SE LOS RECOMIENDO CUBRE CON TODAS LAS ESPECIFICACIONES TECNICAS DETALLADAS EN EL EQUIPO INTERESANTE COMPRA REALIZADA
customer_reviews.author: LUIS RENE RUBIN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and easy to use, especially in "easy" mode. Has many features I didn't expect such as 360 degree scanning and movie mode with audio. Wish the selected carry case also had room for the AC charger though.
customer_reviews.author: TomK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I so love this camera,i love the image that come out from it
customer_reviews.author: HURPSY

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!!, IT IS FAST THE SHIPPED AND ATTENTION, THE COLOR IT IS NICE, I AM GRATEFUL, IT IS PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hermoso

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping, and good quality. Got this for gf for Christmas and has amazing picture. Camera is easy to use and offers plenty of options.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Ordean

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera in it's price class. I was surprised by it's size ( as small as a cell phone ) but with that said, it packs alot of punch. Takes great pictures and is easy to operate. The only drawback is low light pictures aren't as sharp as could be. All in all you get alot for the money with this Sony,
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Lady

customer_reviews.title: Camera Back won't close
customer_reviews.text: Camera Back won't close; have to hold it shut with my hand while taking photo's. Waste of money, won't buy another Sony.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great cammera for a few dollars...16.1 MP for 100 bucks..pretty good ??..works fine great pictures It came with all the cables and stuff
customer_reviews.author: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive camera to snap pictures and take random vids and this camera meets that need perfectly. I am still navigating the features and havent yet mastered all the functions, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rpierre185

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The item arrive on time. I recomend this product. The camara was beautifull I did choose this rating because is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Olga Aranguren

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes nice crisp pictures. I wasn't looking for anything along the lines of a professional camera, but I am pleasantly surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: My parents are in their 50's and I got this camera for their trip to the east coast. My dad was able to use it well enough to get some great shots while they were whale watching. My mom has a bit of a problem focusing the camera, but she's not particularly "tech-savvy". The case is really nicely padded and even with the case the camera is still thin enough to fit in my dad's pocket.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fedewa

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this camera a few years ago, so when my daughter asked for a camera for Christmas I purchased this item quickly. It works great and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I was very happy to receive my camera in a greatly timly manner and packaged well exactly what I was looking for, thanks Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sony cyber-shot a good digicam. It got delivered on time and packing was awesome. I can recommend this. If a 4GB memory card , tey can provide with pack na, it will be awesome, otherwise need to buy separately.
customer_reviews.author: Raj P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 3 month of barely using it - suddenly stopped working
customer_reviews.author: sandra friedwagner

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom last year and she loves it. She switched from a Kodak that was slow to take pictures. So she is very happy with this. She is capturing all of her first grandchild's precious moments. Image quality is good. Screen is easy to view pictures. Settings and buttons are simple.
customer_reviews.author: clytn

customer_reviews.title: wow - value for money bundle
customer_reviews.text: no other word to explain WOWWWWWW Really good camera comes with a handy bag and SD card. Less than 120 bucks is a really good deal for a great camera having a lot of features
customer_reviews.author: subeesh

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W650 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Camera OnlyThe Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W650 Digital Camera (Black) is ready for anything--its 16.1MP resolution guarantees excellent image quality and the sharp Carl Zeiss 5x wide-angle optical 25-125mm (equivalent in 35mm format) lens gives you a true wide-angle-to-telephoto range that's great for landscapes, parties, kids, portraits, etc. This little gem will always be there when you're ready to take a picture--it only weighs 3.8 oz (107.7 g) and fits in a shirt pocket (3.75 x 2.25 x 0.75").The 3" LCD monitor makes it easy to compose and view photographs, or the superb 1280 x 720 HD video. A Sweep Panorama mode makes it a snap to produce a truly impressive ultra wide-angle 360Deg. panoramic photo, even without a tripod and SteadyShot image stabilization plus sensitivity up to 3200 ISO means you can wave good-bye to blurry pictures, even in dim lighting situations.Friends and family will love the way they look in your photos when you're using the Smile Shutter (captures a smile the moment it appears on your subject's face), Anti-Blink (waits until eyes are open to take the picture) and Soft Skin (removes blemishes and wrinkles from faces in your pictures) modes. And, best of all, the W650 will do it all automatically--just press the shutter button in iAuto mode. Great pictures and videos, no stress or strain for you.

Whats In The Box: 



 * Battery (NP-BN)
 * Battery Charger
 * Multi USB Cable
 * Wrist Strap
 * Instruction Manual



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-W650 16.1 MP DIGITAL STILL CAMERA 

 * 720p HD movie mode
   
 * 
 * Sweep Panorama mode (up to 360°)
   
 * 
 * 16.1 megapixel plus a 3.0-inch LCD screen for easy viewing
 * Optical SteadyShot image stablization reduces blur
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
   
 * 
 * 
 * iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
 * Face Detection and Smile Shutter technologies
 * Anti-blink, Face Priority and Red-eye Reduction functions
 * Soft Skin mode reduces visible blemishes and wrinkles
 * iSCN detects 8 scene conditions and adjusts camera settings







Capture brilliant HD video and 360 degree pictures. With a 16.1 megapixel sensor and 3.0-inch LCD, it’s easy to view dazzling images. Optical Steady Shot Image stabilization reduces blur, while iAuto and Picture Effect modes allow you to get more creative with your photos. 



KEY FEATURES
720P MP4 HD MOVIE MODE

In 720p MP4 movie mode the camera shoots 1280 x 720 high definition movies at 30 fps, a standard format when working with a PC. Users will create high quality movies with full use of optical zoom in files small enough to transfer to compatible PC or Mac computer*. Once transferred to your computer and connected to the internet, you can effortlessly upload your media to popular photo and video-sharing websites such as Photobucket and YouTube.




SWEEP PANORAMA MODE (UP TO 360°) 

Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep.


16.1 MEGAPIXEL SUPER HAD CCD IMAGE SENSOR

A powerful 16.1 megapixel 1/2.3-inch Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 16.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19 inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots.


3.0-INCH (230K DOTS) CLEAR PHOTO LCD DISPLAY

Generous 3.0-inch (230K dots) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp and natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight. 


OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality.


PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS
Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects.

INTELLIGENT AUTO MODE

Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent AutoMode (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjust settings resulting in clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Kids on the playground, landscape shots, a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party; all result in clear images without leaving auto mode.

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY

Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.

SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting.

ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION

The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFTSKIN MODE
SoftSkin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE
Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects seven different types of scenes and within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings: Backlight, Backlight Portrait, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Twilight using a tripod, Portrait, Landscape and macro. iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a signle shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light), immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH
Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more life-like images.

DYNAMIC RANGE OPTIMIZER

Standard and Plus Dynamic Range Optimizer (DRO) uses a sophisticated algorithm to help recover shadows and highlights. The result is more natural images with clearer details that more closely match what your naked eye sees. DRO is particularly effective when shooting backlit portraits or any scene with a dramatic constrast between background and foreground lighting. DRO Plus allows for even greateer optimization by analyzing each region of an image and performing additional image processing.

SELF-PORTRAIT TIMER
Self-Portrait Timer helps take the guesswork out of self-portraits by utilizing Face Detection technology to recognize when your face enters the frame. Once the camera detects your face, it triggers a 2-second timer, and then snaps a picture. 

*Movie Recording is limited to (29 min. segments)
 * 
 *
